nodes.documentation:
Library containing the functionality for the bounty and fee payments.
- Bounty payments are the reward paid to the executing agent of transaction
requests.
- Fee payments are the cost of using a Scheduler to make transactions. It is 
a way for developers to monetize their work on the EAC.
nodes.name: PaymentLib

nodes.documentation: @dev Getter function that returns true if a request has a benefactor.
nodes.name: hasFeeRecipient

nodes.documentation: @dev Computes the amount to send to the feeRecipient.
nodes.name: getFee

nodes.documentation: @dev Computes the amount to send to the agent that executed the request.
nodes.name: getBounty

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct PaymentLib.PaymentData storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

nodes.documentation:
@dev Computes the amount to send to the address that fulfilled the request
      with an additional modifier. This is used when the call was claimed.
nodes.name: getBountyWithModifier

nodes.documentation:
@dev Send the feeOwed amount to the feeRecipient.
Note: The send is allowed to fail.
nodes.name: sendFee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Send the bountyOwed amount to the bountyBenefactor.
Note: The send is allowed to fail.
nodes.name: sendBounty
computeEndowment
